TLINE.TDLINE: <ZU>Selection-Screen (Top screen) :</>
This is the first screen displayed when you call the transaction "YTRM".
It will be used to define selection criteria to display Transport
request wished. Two selection modes are available :
- By Transport request number (Multiple values allowed)
- By Transport request Description (Single value only) : It's
not necessary to set the complete transport request description (You can
only set a part of it)
<ZH>Watch out : When you choose a mode, the corresponding
Select-option/parameters is a mandatory field.</>
An additional block is also available to add more restrictions (not
mandatory) during the data selection :
- Transport Request Owner : Only Transport request which are
assigned to the user will be displayed
- Transport Request Object : Only Transport request which
contains the objects set will be displayed.
After filling criteria, click on @15@ Execute button to display
transport request information.
After Tcode execution, the toolbar only shows the @0S@ Application Help
button. All other functionalities will be displayed after program
execution.
<DS:TX.Y_CGI_TRM_APPLICATION_HELP>Return to documentation</>
